name: Drops: Rhythm Garden
description: Drops is a gravity based musical instrument set in a serene environment and designed from the ground up for VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 10760 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
